subject: Order #SSN3220
description_text:
Good morning,

I just want to ask you if you could give me please an update about my order.
I orderer the new simsonn pedals plus x, order number #SSN3220 on 03.11 and
until now is still not sipped.
Just want to make sure that everything is right.

Thank you in advance.
Best regard
Patrick Zambaldi

conversations.body_text:
sorry I cant believe 1 min. ago before I wrote this Mail I recieved a Mail
from your side that the order is on the way...

Thank you a lot :)

Am Do., 6. Nov. 2025 um 09:34 Uhr schrieb Patrick Zambaldi <
zambaldi.patrick@gmail.com>:
